title: What is Creative AI?
body: Creative AI refers to AI systems designed to assist, augment, or generate creative content.

_items.title: Human-Made
_items.body: Created entirely by humans using traditional tools.

_items.title: AI-Assisted
_items.body: Humans lead the creative process with AI support.

_items.title: AI-Generated
_items.body: AI produces content based on prompts and parameters.

_items.text: Which best describes the augmentation mindset?
